summary: BOTH FRONT TIRES ARE BEING DAMAGED BY RUBBING AGAINST SOMETHING IN THE WHEEL WELL. I TOOK THE VEHICLE BACK TO THE DEALER WHERE IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE REPAIRED. THE PROBLEM WAS NOT REMEDIED, TIRE DAMAGE IS STILL OCCURRING HIGH ON THE INNER SIDEWALL OF BOTH FRONT TIRES. TIRES ARE THE SAME SIZE THAT CAME ON VEHICLE FROM FACTORY 245 - 75/R16. *JB
